main.name: Garvit Khurana
main.description: I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life with my programming skills.
main.contactmessage: Have me make stuff for you. If you like my work and have some cool projects to work on, just send me a direct message or contact me through social sites.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering with specialization in AI & Machine Learning
education.description: Computer Science Engineering (CSE) encompasses a variety of topics that relates to computation, like analysis of algorithms, programming languages, program design, operating systems, database management, software, and computer hardware.                            Also, the AI & Machine Learning part of the course contains in depth coverage of topics like Python, AI, ML Algorithms, Neural Networks, Computer Vision & Deep Learning

work.title: Team Member
work.description: The Semicolons is a team that develops innovative and creative solutions for real-world software problems. The general purpose of Semicolons is to develop and promote advanced information technologies for multi-user operation.

testimonials.text: Garvit has a great mentality that always seeks to improve his skills. His discipline makes working with him easy and challenging at the same time. He loves to share his ideas and accomplishments with other people, which makes him very easily leave an impact in any working environment.
testimonials.user: Utkarsh Gupta | Team Leader - The Semicolons;

testimonials.text: I worked with Garvit during a hackathon. Garvit is detailed orientated, has advanced system engineering and problem-solving skills. He has the ability to effectively manage several tasks at a time.
testimonials.user: Ishan Agarwal | Team Member - The Semicolons;
